text: Welcome to How To Cook That I'm Ann Reardon.

Today we are making Freak shakes which are
like milkshakes that have gone crazy. Which
one would you like to have?

This idea comes from a cafe in Australia called
PÃ¢tissez they have people queuing for 40 minutes
to get one of these.

The first thing we need to do is make some
ganache. Use a mixture of milk and dark chocolate
and pour over some hot cream.

I'll put all of the recipe quantities for
these on the http;//howtocookthat.net website

for you, and there is a link in the description
below.

Once that has rested for a few minutes give
it a good stir until it is well combined and
looks glossy and yummy.

For each two milkshakes that you want to make
measure out half a cup of this ganache and

put it to one side at room temperature. Pour
the rest of the ganache into a plastic bag.

Flatten it out and put it in the freezer to
chill so it thickens up.

If you put it in just in a bowl it will take
a lot longer to chill.

All of the shakes have cream on top. So take
some whipping cream and add a little vanilla

extract. Then use electric beaters to whip
the cream. You'll need to turn the beaters

off to check if it is ready - this is nearly
done but see how it's not quite holding its

shape it's still a bit droopy. Just give it
a little bit longer... and then turn it off

and check again and that's how it should be.
So you don't want to over whip it.

Place that into a piping bag fitted with a
star shaped nozzle and just put that to one
side while we can make our shakes.
for the CHOCOLATE BROWNIE FREAK SHAKE

Place the half a cup of that ganache into
a blender with milk and ice cream. and blend

that up well and you get a really rich chocolatey
milkshake

Using the ganache that we put in the freezer
so it is nice and thick spread a scoop onto

the inside of the jars. Then spread another
scoop around the top of the glass, now be

really generous here because we want the to
look crazy and over the top. To make it look

shiny heat the outside for a moment with a
brulee torch. We don't want to burn it so

not too long just a quick pass over.
Add a scoop of ice cream to each one and pour

in the chocolate milkshake. And you'll see
that ice cream just float to the top which

is going to help when we are putting our cream
on.

Pipe a circle of cream starting around the
outside edge of the jar then around in a spiral

into the middle. Then pipe more on top because
everything about these is generous and over
the top.

To each one add a square of chocolate brownie
and a big marshmallow. Then use your brulee

torch to toast the marshmallow until it is
brown and melted and crispy and it's ready
to serve.

For the NUTELLA PRETZEL milkshake in a blender
put milk, half a cup of ganache, a big spoon

of nutella and of course a scoop of ice cream.
and blend that all together.

Smear some nutella inside the jars and even
more around the top. This one really is for

people who just like to eat nutella by the
spoonful. Flatten it out a nit around the

top there and then add pretzels around the
top of each one. Add a scoop of ice-cream
and pour in the nutella milkshake.

Pipe the cream around the top. Then add more
nutella and pretzels to decorate. Yum

To make the CARAMEL APPLE PIE freak-shakes,
these are my husband Dave's favourite. Take
a sheet of puff pastry and cut it into quarters.

Add some tinned apple to one side. Then fold
the pastry in half over the top.

Use a fork to seal the edges and place onto
a baking tray. If you're apple is unsweetened

sprinkle you may want to sprinkle a little
sugar on top. and bake in the oven for 15
minutes.

In a blender pour in some milk, salted caramel
and ice cream and whip that altogether.

Smear some caramel on the inside of the jar
just like we did with the nutella and around

the top edge. If you want it dripping down
heat it with a brulee torch and it will pour

down the sides there.. Add the ice-cream and
salted caramel milkshake. Then pipe your cream

on top and put and apple pie on top of that
and then drizzle with more caramel sauce.

Now for our DONUT FREAK SHAKES Place some
jam around the outside of your jar and then

add some custard around as well. Put in a
scoop of vanilla ice cream then pour in a

vanilla milkshake which is just made with
your vanilla ice cream and milk.

Top that with cream.
Then add your straw right into the center

and put the donut over the top placing it
right in the middle so it doesn't slide off.

Which one would you like to have? My kids
are going to eat these after school today.

If you love how to cook that share the video
subscribe for more crazy sweet creations.

Click here for the recipes. Here for last
weeks giant hershey's kiss, here for all my

other dessert videos and here for my youtube
channel. Have a great week and I'll see you
all on Friday.
